parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.26</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the class name of a [[Control]] as it is defined in config. If you need config class of a game created [[Display]], it is stored on display itself:
<code>_className <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> [[findDisplay]] 12 [[getVariable]] ["BIS_fnc_initDisplay_configClass", ""]; // "RscDiary"</code> </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''ctrlClassName''' control </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> control : [[Control]]  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[String]] - class name</value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 


</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> List class names of all controls present on display 46:<code>_return = [] ;
{
	_return [[pushBack]] [[format]] ["IDC: %1, className: %2", [[ctrlIDC]] _x, [[ctrlClassName]] _x];
} [[forEach]] ([[allControls]] ([[findDisplay]] 46));
[[copyToClipboard]] (_return [[joinString]] [[endl]]);</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[ctrlIDC]], [[ctrlIDD]], [[ctrlType]], [[ctrlCreate]], [[ctrlDelete]], [[ctrlModel]], [[ctrlSetModel]], [[ctrlPosition]], [[ctrlSetPosition]], [[ctrlModelScale]], [[ctrlSetModelScale]], [[ctrlModelDirAndUp]], [[ctrlSetModelDirAndUp]]  </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="7"/><value>  </value></part><part><name>MPBEHAVIOUR</name>=<value> 
____________________________________________________________________________________________
</value></part></template>
